comments:
Build id: 200303071024

Reopening a workspace I created today for testing this build, I got a message 
saying:

"Unable to read workbench state. Workbench UI layout will be reset."

I had no crashes in previous sessions. Unfortunately, I couldn't reproduce it 
anymore.
 
Here is the log file:

!SESSION Mar 07, 2003 15:12:59.906 ---------------------------------------------

Should be possible to isolate errors in different areas of workbenck restore.
Failure to restore navigation history should not cause the rest of the ui 
state to fail.
I got this as well this morning.

Steps to reproduce:
  Open Eclipse with a new workspace.
  Create a a.mpe file.
  Close Eclipse  and delete workbench.xml 
  Open Eclipse
  Close the welcome editor.
  Open a.mpe.
  Close it.
  Reopen a.mpe.
  Close Eclipse
** Check workbench.xml. There is a history entry with index = -1.
